title: 08/27/2021 - HOUR 1 - Jameis Winston
itunes:title: 08/27/2021 - HOUR 1 - Jameis Winston
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Doug Gottlieb--in for Colin--tells us there's hope for Saints quarterback Jameis Winston in New Orleans after you look at the history of notable quarterbacks who played in Tampa, flamed out, and had success elsewhere. Plus, CBS Sports' NFL and college football analyst Danny Kanell joins The Herd to discuss college football's shifting geopolitics. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
